titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 186: Prayer book, incipit

notesStmt.note: Titles are square characters, the rest in semi-cursive characters; The incipit of a Siddur, the recto is Hebrew, the headline סידור followed by phrases of prayer, the verso is in Judeo-Arabic, titled כתאב ישתמל עלי אלצלואת\אלאוגבה אלדאימה ואלתסאביח\ ואלפראיץ אלתי הי לכל מזמן לאזמה.
Condition: torn, lacking lower portion and upper edge.

msIdentifier.repository: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

history.provenance: Cairo Genizah Collection (University of Pennsylvania. Center for Advanced Judaic Studies. Library).
